title: Header company name single-line layout + brand blue text color fix

requirements.summary: Adjust the header logo/company-name block so the company name stays on a single line to the right of the logo without wrapping.
acceptanceCriteria: In the sticky header, the company name appears on one line next to the logo at common viewport sizes (mobile and desktop) without splitting into two stacked lines.
The header layout remains aligned (logo and company name vertically centered) and does not overlap the navigation or mobile menu button.

file_operations.description: Update the header 'Logo and Company Name' markup/classes to render the company name as a single-line string next to the logo (e.g., switch from stacked spans to one line with non-wrapping behavior), and ensure it truncates/shrinks appropriately on narrow screens to avoid overlapping nav/menu button.

requirements.summary: Set the header company name text color to brand blue #010080 without changing other site colors.
acceptanceCriteria: The company name text in the header uses hex color #010080.
No other unrelated text colors across the site are changed as part of this fix.

file_operations.description: Change only the header company-name text styling to use hex color #010080 (scoped to the company name element, not global theme variables) so no other text colors are affected.
